actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service Discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Received in the Senate and ordered held at the desk until the close of business September 30, 1982.
Passed Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the month of October, 1982, as "Head Start Awareness Month".

summary.text: Designates October 1982 as Head Start Awareness Month.

titles.title: A joint resolution to provide for the designation of the month of October, 1982, as "Head Start Awareness Month".
